name: Archived channel is removed from drawer when you navigate away
precondition:
Important

Ensure that `Allow users to view archived channels` is enabled on the server and some public and private archived channels exist
(Setting can be found in System Console under "Users and Teams")

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
Archive channel is removed from drawer when you navigate away
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Open an Archived channel
  2. Select another channel from the drawer
inline.expectedResult: • Archive channel is removed from drawer when you navigate away
